general_advisory: Dry weather along with normal to below normal minimum temperature is expected. Farmers are advised to protect crops and animals from cold conditions.

advisory: To control weeds in the nursery, spray Pyrazosulfuron-ethyl 10% WP or Bispyribac sodium.
Transplant 3-5 week old seedlings in well-puddled soil.
Monitor and control Aphid attack in mustard.
Spray Acetamiprid or Imidachloprid against Aphid attack.
Avoid insecticide application at initial flowering stage.
Wrap or fix polythene/alkathane sheet on mango trees to manage mealy bug.
Use straw as mulching material to maintain soil moisture and temperature.
Harvest matured crops and provide light irrigation.
Train and prune diseased branches and leaves.
Cover animal shelter from cold winds during night.
Feed animals with oil cakes and jiggery to maintain body temperature.
Avoid keeping animals in damp areas.
Cover weak and sick animals with cloth.
Provide additional feed to pregnant animals.
